name: Road Rash (1996)
description:
Road Rash (1996) is a racing-arcade game developed by Papyrus Racing Games and Buzz Puppet Productions. It was originally released in 1996. Electronic Arts published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Road Rash (1996) on SEGA Saturn, PlayStation, PC and 3DO.
It was scored by Michael Bartlow and Rob Hubbard.
